snippet: Sarah Michelson’s “Devotion Study #1 — The American Dancer” was presented at the Whitney Museum.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews performance of Devotion Study 1 — The American Dancer, choreographed by Sarah Michelson for the 2012 Whitney Museum of American Art Biennial.
lead_paragraph: Sarah Michelson’s “Devotion Study #1 — The American Dancer” was presented at the Whitney Museum.

headline.seo: Sarah Michelson’s ‘Devotion Study #1’ at Whitney Museum
headline.main: Five Figures Circling, Backward, Across a Blueprint of the Whitney
